name: ORDER_RAD_ADDEND
description: This table stores information about imaging addenda.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADDENDUM_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The addendum status category ID for the order

columns.name: ADDEND_RAD_ID
columns.description: The ID of the imaging physician that signed the addendum.

columns.name: ADDENDED_DT
columns.description: The date the addendum was signed.

columns.name: ADDENDED_TM
columns.description: The time the addendum was signed.

columns.name: ADDENDED_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant an addendum was created, in UTC time zone.
